Exercise: Kegels x 2 sets of - slow lift for 20s, 15x quick both: standing split stance
Foam Roll - piriformis
Reps: find a tight spot & hold for 15-20s

Exercise: Foam Roll hip flexor
Pigeon pose
Notes: Hips facing forwards upright or fold forwards

Exercise: Hip flexor stretch (biphasic)
Side bend
Trunk twist
Heel toe & ankle circles
1. Band around thighs & press out in squat position
2. 30s -1m per side single leg hop side to side
3. 30s per side other side
4. 1m crab walk & band pull in hands long band - band on feet around forefoot
5. A skip on the spot 30s, 30s high knees
2 x 30 calf raises straight leg off a step can add weight in opposite hand
Hip hikes - if too easy standing - off a step
1 leg bridge
Continuous squat jumps
Notes: Inhale down, exhale as you come up

Exercise: Squat w band around thighs to OHP
Lunge on the spot weights by your side
Notes: Work up to 5kg. Hips facing forwards, careful not to dip the hip, engage the back glute, weight in the heels on the way down

Exercise: YTA on 1 leg
1 leg squat to stand off sofa
Clam shell 30s, the move band to ankles and straight leg raise pulse last 10s
Notes: Lie on your side, squeeze your glutes as if you're holding a penny in between them, lift you side off the floor, contract your core, lift the knee until it is level with the hips

Exercise: Side plank full w rotation
Russian twist w weight or BW - feet on ground
Optional: Lateral (side) bear crawl (optional to put knees nearer ground)
Hip flexor as per warm-up but just hold
Piriformis - pigeon pose on mat
Stretch full body
